getWritePosition

public long getWritePosition()
                      throws IOException
Description copied from interface: LogWriter
return the current write position. This is used as a hint for the length of the current log file - it has not been closed and hence the file system status does not reflect its true size.

Specified by:
getWritePosition in interface LogWriter
Throws:
IOException
